name: SEQ_DOC
description: This table contains information about your genomics sequencing pipeline documents.

columns.name: SEQ_DOC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the sequencing document record.

columns.name: CLOUD_VOL_AND_BLOB
columns.description: The cloud volume and blob name where the sequencing document is stored

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The primary patient for this sample. Only sample types of Tumor and ProbandGL are considered for this association.

columns.name: SEQ_DOC_FILE_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The file class category ID for the sequencing document.

columns.name: FILE_DESC
columns.description: This item holds a user facing description of the sequencing document.
